title: How to Turn on Dark Mode on Twitter on a PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to www.twitter.com in your browser.
steps.content: Go to www.twitter.com in your browser. You can use any web browser on your computer, including Firefox, Chrome, or Safari. Log in with your account, if you haven't already done so.

steps.title: Click on the ⋯ More option.
steps.content: Click on the ⋯ More option. You will find this option in the left menu panel. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select the Display option from the drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select the Display option from the drop-down menu. It will be the second to last option on the list. This will open a pop-up window.

steps.title: Select Dim or Lights out.
steps.content: Select Dim or Lights out . Select “Dim” for a bluish dark theme. If you want to enable the true black dark theme, select the “Light out” option.

steps.title: That's it!
steps.content: That's it! You can turn off the Dark Mode in the same way if you want to go back to the regular settings.
